Title: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of education to conduct a study regarding ecological literacy and healthy living curriculum in schools, and to provide recommendations in a report
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of education to conduct a study regarding ecological literacy and healthy living curriculum in schools, and to provide recommendations in a report.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing and directing the commissioner of education to conduct a study regarding ecological literacy and healthy living curriculum in schools, and to provide recommendations
